title: Tormented

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, 3 players are your targets. You are not told who. Your targets will never be a Town power role or a Peasant. At least two will be town members.
- Each night, you have nightmares and receive 3 fake system messages related to the roles of each target ie:
- You were shot! (if target is a Vigilante)
- Player B is innocent. (If your target is a sheriff)
- You successfully killed (player)! (if your target is a serial killer)
(basically anything a hypnotist could show you can appear in a nightmare)
- If a target received real system messages, you will see a random one of those instead of the fake system message about them.
- When you die, you can deal an immediate unstoppable attack to any chosen player. This is able to fulfill your destiny if all of your targets are now dead.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: See all players who you have nightmares about dead.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4223
*The nightmares only ever seemed to get more intense. The madness did not appear on the surface, but in the deeper recesses of her mind, she hated each tormentor.*
